change.changenote: Section 1 (2) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 30/2022, effective February 15, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: when the person entitled to the refund has completed any procedures required of him at law to perfect his claim to the refund.

change.changenote: Section 4 (1), (2), (2.1) and (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 258/2023, effective January 1, 2023 [retro from December 4, 2023].

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Subject to subsection (2.1), where section 1 (1) (b) applies to an account, the government shall pay interest on the money it owes on that account calculated from the later of
Subject to subsection (2.1), where section 1 (2) applies to an account, the government shall pay interest on the money it owes on that account calculated from the later of

Where section 1 (1) (b) or (2) applies to money owed by the government to a carrier, as that term is defined in the Motor Fuel Tax Act, as a result of money paid or purportedly paid to the government under or in accordance with one or both of the Motor Fuel Tax Act and the International Fuel Tax Agreement, the government shall pay interest on that money calculated from the 91st day after the day that the government receives the overpayment or becomes obliged to refund the money, as the case may be.
This section does not operate to require the payment of an amount of interest less than $5.

change.changenote: Section 5 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 30/2022, effective February 15, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Interest under section 3 or 4 stops accruing on the date payment of the money owed is mailed to the person to whom it is owed, or, if delivered to him without mailing, the date of delivery.

change.changenote: Section 6 (1.1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 258/2023, effective January 1, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The rate of interest payable for section 4 (2.1) shall, for each 3 month period beginning on January 1, April 1, July 1 and October 1 in every year, be 2% above the Canadian Federal Treasury Bill rate on the 15th day of the month immediately preceding that 3 month period.

change.changenote: Section 7 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 258/2023, effective January 1, 2023 [retro from December 4, 2023].

bcl:section.bcl:text: On money owed by the government, interest shall be

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: calculated on the number of days since the last compounding of interest or, where no compounding has yet occurred, since the interest commencement date.
